bioconda.name: egglib
bioconda.summary: Evolutionary Genetics and Genomics Library. EggLib is a C++/Python library and program package for evolutionary genetics and genomics. Main features are sequence data management, sequence polymorphism analysis, and coalescent simulations. EggLib is a flexible Python module with a performant underlying C++ library and allows fast and intuitive development of Python programs and scripts.
